title: PhD Research Scholar Senthil, who committed suicide at University of Hyderabad in 2008, was one of the first Dalit institutional deaths that mobilized student movements across the country. Here is his father's letter to the VC, University of Hyderabad, on 05.04.2008

title: University Grants Commission guidelines against caste discrimination in university spaces --- this was in response to increase in suicides in higher educational institutes particularly of marginalized students. Senthil's death and the students' movement behind it was the catalyst as the report states.

title: Student suspensions and related correspondence
description:
Doc 1. University of Hyderabad Registrar's letter seeking information regarding suspension on 5th January 2016
Doc 2. Letter by MHRD, Govt. of India, to University of Hyderabad administration seeking action
Doc 3. Letter by Minister of State Dattatreya to Ms. Smriti Irani, MP, MHRD on 17th August 2015
Doc 4. Counter-affidavit filed by University authorities at AP High Court on 28th November 2015
Doc 5. Report of the sub-committee of the executive council that upholds suspension of Dalit research scholars on 24th November 2015
Doc 6. Letter by Prof. Y.A. Sudhakar Reddy to uphold the decision by the sub-committee
Doc 7. Proctoral board letter to Dontha Prashanth, one of the suspended students on 9th September 2015
Doc 8. Rohith Vemula's letter to the vice chancellor on 18th December 2015 requesting long rope and poison
publisher: Merian-Tagore International Centre of Advanced Studies
fileUrl: http://campuscollection.openrun.net/samim/HCU/Students movements --- HCU Documents/HCU Scanned and Digitized documents/150000HCUSM0002.pdf

title: HCU Students Suicide Report
description:
Index of supportive documents to the report
Doc 1. Facts of the case - Joint Action Committee for Social Justice (2-6)
Doc 2. Executive Committee order expelling students on 16.12.2015 (7-10)
Doc 3. Extended Proctoral committee report 12.08.2015 (11-14)
Doc 4. Proctoral committee report 31.08.2015 (15)
Doc 5. Suspension order 08.09.2015 (17)
Doc 6. Ambedkar Students Association representation to the HCU administration 10.09.2015 (18)
Doc 7. Revocation order 11.09.2015 (19)
Doc 8. Report of EC-Subcommittee 24.11.2015 (20-25)
Doc 9. Letter written by Union Minister Bandaru Dattatreya to MHRD 17.08.2015 (26)
Doc 10. The Last Letter by Rohith Vemula 17.01.2016 (27)
